nl: Show that if $\prod X_\alpha$ is regular, then so is $X_\alpha$. Assume that each $X_\alpha$ is nonempty.
lean:
∀ {ι : Type*} {X : ι → Type*} [∀ i, TopologicalSpace (X i)]
  (h : ∀ i, Nonempty (X i)) (h2 : RegularSpace (Π i, X i)), ∀ i, RegularSpace (X i)
